<resource>
  <capability namespace='osgi.identity'>
    <attribute name='osgi.identity' value='org.example.b'/>
    <attribute name='type' value='osgi.bundle'/>
    <attribute name='version' type='Version' value='0.0.0'/>
  </capability>
  <capability namespace='osgi.content'>
    <attribute name='osgi.content' value='testdata/org.example.b.jar'/>
    <attribute name='description' value='Example Bundle B'/>
    <attribute name='size' value='1544'/>
  </capability>
</resource>
